name: Veiled Depth
description:
Made under 72 hours as an entry for Ludum Dare 48

Explore the bottom of a forgotten ocean floor, full of mysterious alien creatures. Harvest nature's bounty and craft weapons and supplies, so that you can make it into the bottom of the ocean, and unveil its secrets!

Tips:

  • You can build ammunition for your harpoon gun by swimming to the top of the map.
  • You can use your blowtorch as a weapon if you get cornered without ammo

Controls: 

  • Press [E] to open your backpack and drag items into your inventory
  • [W, A, S, D] to move your character.
  • [SPACE] to give yourself an impulse
  • [1] Equip harpoon gun. You must buy ammo at the top of the screen!
  • [2] Consume any available oxygen tanks in your inventory
  • [3] Equip blowtorch

Programming: 

Diego Di Salvatore / AI

Jesús Chang / Gameplay

Miguel Fraga / UIs

Art: 

Antony Gervez / Art and Sound Effects.

Music:

https://www.bensound.com/
